languages.text: Прогулка прошла мирно и надолго запомнилась офицерам, обсуждавшим ее недели спустя. Даже ксенос Ирлиэт не осталась равнодушна, подолгу разглядывая каменные колонны, усыпанные отражениями звезд. Она даже заговорила с другими офицерами, промолвив, что это место напоминает ей родной мир Крударах.

traits.locale_text: Прогулка прошла мирно и надолго запомнилась офицерам, обсуждавшим ее недели спустя. Даже ксенос Ирлиэт не осталась равнодушна, подолгу разглядывая каменные колонны, усыпанные отраженные звездами. Она даже заговорила с другими офицерами, промолвив, что это место напоминает ей родной мир Крударах.

languages.text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Even the xenos Yrliet marvelled at the rock columns sprinkled with reflected stars. She even deigned to speak to the other officers, telling them the place reminded her of Crudarach, her homeworld.
languages.original_text: Прогулка прошла мирно и надолго запомнилась офицерам, обсуждавшим ее недели спустя. Даже ксенос Ирлиэт не осталась равнодушна, подолгу разглядывая каменные колонны, усыпанные отражениями звезд. Она даже заговорила с другими офицерами, промолвив, что это место напоминает ей родной мир Крударах.

traits.locale_text: The shore leave went peacefully and impressed everyone involved. Even Xenos Yrliet was impressed by the reflection the night sky in the rock columns. She even deigned other crew members with a friendly chat and said that the planet reminded her of her homeworld.

The shore leave went peacefully and impressed everyone involved. Even Xenos Yrliet was impressed by the reflection the night sky in the rock columns. She even deigned other crew members with a friendly chat and said that the planet reminded her of her homeworld.

The shore leave was peaceful; the officers went on to discuss it for weeks. Even the xenos Yrliet was impressed by the reflection of the night sky sprinkled throughout the rock columns. She even deigned other crew members with a friendly chat mentioning that the planet reminded her of her homeworld Crudarach.

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Even the xenos Yrliet marvelled at the rock columns sprinkled with reflected stars. She even deigned to speak to the other officers, telling them the place reminded her of Crudarach, her homeworld.

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Even the xenos Yrliet marvelled at the rock columns sprinkled with reflected stars. She even deigned to speak to the other officers, telling them the place reminded her of Crudarach, her homeworld.

The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Even the xenos Yrliet marvelled at the rock columns sprinkled with reflected stars. She even deigned to speak to the other officers, telling them the place reminded her of Crudarach, her homeworld.

languages.text: 岸上的休假风平浪静地结束了。在这之后的几个星期里，船上的军官始终都在谈论这里的奇景。就连异形伊莉耶特都惊叹于那些洒满了星光的岩柱。她甚至屈尊与其他军官交谈，说这个地方让她想起了她的故乡克鲁达拉赫。
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Even the xenos Yrliet marvelled at the rock columns sprinkled with reflected stars. She even deigned to speak to the other officers, telling them the place reminded her of Crudarach, her homeworld.

traits.locale_text: 岸上的休假风平浪静地结束了。在这之后的几个星期里，船上的军官始终都在谈论这里的奇景。就连异形伊莉耶特都惊叹于那些洒满了星光的岩柱。她甚至屈尊与其他军官交谈，说这个地方让她想起了她的故乡克鲁达拉赫。

languages.text: El permiso concluyó sin incidentes, y los oficiales de la nave hablaron sobre ello durante semanas. Incluso la xenos Yrliet se maravilló ante las columnas de roca cubiertas de estrellas reflejadas. Incluso se dignó a hablar con los demás oficiales, comentándoles que la zona le recordaba a Crudarach, su mundo natal.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Even the xenos Yrliet marvelled at the rock columns sprinkled with reflected stars. She even deigned to speak to the other officers, telling them the place reminded her of Crudarach, her homeworld.

traits.locale_text: El permiso concluyó sin incidentes, y los oficiales de la nave hablaron sobre ello durante semanas. Incluso la xenos Yrliet se maravilló ante las columnas de roca cubiertas de estrellas reflejadas. Incluso se dignó a hablar con los demás oficiales, comentándoles que la zona le recordaba a Crudarach, su mundo natal.

languages.text: 寄港地での休暇は何事もなく終わり、その後何週間も船員たちはそのことを話題にした。異種族（ゼノ）であるユリエットも、星が反射した岩柱に感嘆の声を上げた。彼女は他の士官たちにまで、この場所が自分の故郷であるクルダラを思い出させると話した。
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Even the xenos Yrliet marvelled at the rock columns sprinkled with reflected stars. She even deigned to speak to the other officers, telling them the place reminded her of Crudarach, her homeworld.

traits.locale_text: 寄港地での休暇は何事もなく終わり、その後何週間も船員たちはそのことを話題にした。異種族（ゼノ）であるユリエットも、星が反射した岩柱に感嘆の声を上げた。彼女は他の士官たちにまで、この場所が自分の故郷であるクルダラを思い出させると話した。

languages.text: Der Landgang verlief ohne Zwischenfälle, und die Offiziere des Schiffs sprachen noch wochenlang darüber. Selbst die Xenos Yrliet bestaunte die Felssäulen, die mit gespiegelten Sternen besprenkelt waren. Sie ließ sich sogar dazu herab, mit den anderen Offizieren zu sprechen, und sagte ihnen, dass sie sich hier an ihre Heimatwelt Crudarach erinnert fühlte.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Even the xenos Yrliet marvelled at the rock columns sprinkled with reflected stars. She even deigned to speak to the other officers, telling them the place reminded her of Crudarach, her homeworld.

traits.locale_text: Der Landgang verlief ohne Zwischenfälle, und die Offiziere des Schiffs sprachen noch wochenlang darüber. Selbst die Xenos Yrliet bestaunte die Felssäulen, die mit gespiegelten Sternen besprenkelt waren. Sie ließ sich sogar dazu herab, mit den anderen Offizieren zu sprechen, und sagte ihnen, dass sie sich hier an ihre Heimatwelt Crudarach erinnert fühlte.

languages.text: La permission se déroule sans accrocs et les officiers du vaisseau en parlent encore des semaines plus tard. Même la xénos Yrliet s'émerveilla des colonnes de pierres ornées du reflet des étoiles. Elle daigna même adresser la parole aux autres officiers pour leur dire que cet endroit lui évoquait Crudarach, son monde natal.
languages.original_text: The shore leave passed without incident, and the ship's officers talked about it for weeks afterward. Even the xenos Yrliet marvelled at the rock columns sprinkled with reflected stars. She even deigned to speak to the other officers, telling them the place reminded her of Crudarach, her homeworld.

Même la xénos Yrliet s'émerveilla des colonnes de pierres ornées du reflet des étoiles. Elle daigna même adresser la parole aux autres officiers pour leur dire que cet endroit lui évoquait Crudarach, son monde natal.
